text: Jini Dellaccio (née Duckworth; January 31, 1917 – July 3, 2014)Dellaccio, Jini (b. 1917), Photographer HistoryLink.org Essay 8953 by Peter Blecha is an American photographer. He is best known for her images of rock and pop acts of the 1960s. Her photographs of the Sonics, the Wailers, Merrilee Rush, the Daily Flash and many others were used for album covers, posters, and publicity stills. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jini Dellaccio Collection (official site), includes examples of Dellaccio's photography and short samples of music by several 1960s Pacific Northwest bands she photographed. * Her Aim is True , official site of documentary about Dellaccio, includes trailer * Rock & Roll: Jini Dellaccio, gallery, Photo Center NW exhibit November 1 – December 16, 2011 Category:1917 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American photographers Category:People from Indiana
title: Jini Dellaccio
